summary: Several children go to a lifelong space mission to Cassiopeia because they don't want to go to school.
cast: Innokentiy Smoktunovskiy|Misha Yershov|Aleksandr Grigoryev|Vasiliy Merkurev|Lev Durov|Vladimir Savin|Vladimir Basov Ml.|Yuriy Medvedev|Olga Bityukova|Pyotr Merkurev|Nadezhda Ovcharova|Irina Savina|Anatoliy Adoskin|Natalya Fateeva|Nikolai Figurovsky|Artyom Karapetyan|Irina Korotkova|Valentina Kutsenko|Yuri Puchinin|Svetlana Radchenko|Raisa Ryazanova|Nadezhda Sementsova|Natalya Strizhenova|Nikolay Viktorov|Anna Viktorova|Mikhail Yanushkevich|Avenir Zak|Vladimir Zolotaryov
title: Moskva-Kassiopeya
